mapper.select: SELECT no,tname,tphoto,num FROM (SELECT no,tname,tphoto,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,tname,tphoto FROM tourplace ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM tourtag ORDER BY tagname
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW TOURPLACETAG_CONTENT AS SELECT DISTINCT y.no,y.tname,y.tphoto FROM tourtagmapper x JOIN tourplace y ON x.tno=y.no WHERE x.tagcode IN (${tagcode}) ORDER BY y.no
SELECT no,tname,tphoto,num FROM (SELECT no,tname,tphoto,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,tname,tphoto FROM TOURPLACETAG_CONTENT ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
